import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { GlobalContext } from "../context/GlobalState"; export const IncomeExpense = () => { const { transactions } = useContext(GlobalContext); const amounts = transactions .map((transaction) => transaction.amount) const income = amounts .filter((amount) => {return amount > 0}) .reduce((acc, item) => (acc += item), 0) const expense = amounts .filter((amount) => {return amount < 0}) .reduce((acc, item) => (acc += item), 0) return (

Income

+${Math.abs(income)}

Expense

-${Math.abs(expense)}

) }
